data.text:
2024 Wooden Shoe Tulip Festival

The Wooden Shoe Tulip Festival is an annual celebration of spring, showcasing acres of breathtaking tulip fields in bloom. Located in Woodburn, our festival attracts visitors from near and far to experience the beauty of millions of blooming tulips.

Plan Your Visit:

Dates and Hours: Our tulips bloom from late March until early May. We generally expect the best overlap of color in mid-April. Every year is different as our tulips bloom based on growing degree days. Outside of our tulip festival we do not have any tulips in bloom.

Admission: General admission tickets are available online only. Visit here for detailed ticketing information, along with any available package deals or special offers.

Other admission types include wine tours, farm tours, sunrise tickets, season passes, wooden shoe making classes, and more.

Location: Our festival is located at 33814 S Meridian Rd, Woodburn, OR 97071, a short drive from Portland or Salem. Ample parking is available onsite and included with your admission ticket.

Accessibility: We strive to make the festival accessible to all visitors. Please let us know if you have any specific accessibility needs, and we will do our best to accommodate you.
